title: OCD XVI registration closed... we are full!

posts.content:
1. Buzz (Buzz & Maz & kids) - 1954 11 window kombi
2. OP (Neil + 1 maybe) - 1955 11 window kombi
3. Claushema (Dan & Robin) - 1967 S042
4. GreenBeetleDave (Dave & Jean) - 1963 11 window microbus/camper[/quote]
5. Dc67 Greg & Steph 67 double cab
6. Bren ( Bren & Sandra ) 1966 11 Window kombi
7.Geocamper1(Aeron) 1965 11 window microbus/Camper
8. Bunda & family (Lauren, Hannah and Viola) 1966 Arcomobil
9. Si & Andi - 1961 11 window kombi (devon)
10. Andrew & Michelle - 1967 11 Window Kombi (Devon)
we are full..... and with no facebook share..... the forum is still strong!

Buzz, it's full because you organise such a fantastic trip that we all want to be a part off.
While you keep organising it, we will all keep coming.
Buzz, congrats on another sold out tour!!!

Mike1973 wrote:Full?! Too slow to register this year Have a good one OCD'rs!


What? Asleep at the switch? You'll be missed.
are we having an ocd prequel at the cider farm again this year ?
I was thinking the same thing. I'm planning to be there on Monday nite barring any breakdowns.
we wont be there until Wednesday afternoon as per last year ,will probably pop into the street outlet village en route and grab a few bargains from saltrock.

made it!

Frankiedemus,

Were you on the OCD in 2014 and your daughter was riding on a 3 wheel scooter in her pajama? I think she is the same age as Robin (10) which is great.

Dan, yes thats her, just turned 11 she will be looking for a friend
